HeroSlider.subtitle1: Reliable partner for successful growth of your business

page.title: About Us
page.description: We are a leading trade and distribution company specializing in the import and sale of a wide range of goods throughout Tajikistan.
page.valuesText: Commitment to quality service, building customer trust, and continuous development. We pride ourselves on our reputation as a leader and reliable partner that contributes to the availability of the best goods for businesses and the population of Tajikistan.
page.conclusion: Today, «Capital-T» is a modern, dynamically developing company with great potential and prospects.
page.yearsDescription: serving cities and districts throughout Tajikistan
page.branchesTitle: Branches with warehouse and sales team
page.branchCities: Tursunzade, Istaravshan, Panjakent, Isfara, Bokhtar, Vose, Garm
page.partnersDescription: Our portfolio includes world-renowned brands whose products are successfully promoted in our market. Main product categories: food products and hygiene products.

NewsSection2.title: News
NewsSection2.heading: Leading trade and distribution company
NewsSection2.paragraph1: «CAPITAL-T» is one of the largest distribution companies in the Republic of Tajikistan, engaged in wholesale trade and distribution of food products, perfumery and cosmetics, hygiene products, etc.
NewsSection2.paragraph2: Since 2000, CAPITAL-T LLC began to develop dynamically, establishing new partnerships, increasing the number of clients, improving the company's material and technical base, and refining software.
NewsSection2.paragraph3: The Company regularly carries out extensive work to expand the geography of sales, with the aim of covering remote and hard-to-reach areas of the republic. The organizational structure is changing, wholesale is actively developing...

NewsDetail.heading: Leading trade and distribution company
NewsDetail.aboutParagraph1: «CAPITAL-T» is one of the largest distribution companies in the Republic of Tajikistan, engaged in wholesale trade and distribution of food products, perfumery and cosmetics, hygiene products, etc.
NewsDetail.aboutParagraph2: Since 2000, CAPITAL-T LLC has begun to develop dynamically, establishing new partnerships, increasing the number of clients, improving the company's material and technical base, and refining software.
NewsDetail.aboutParagraph3: The company regularly carries out extensive work to expand the geography of sales, aiming to cover remote and hard-to-reach areas of the republic. The organizational structure is changing, wholesale and retail sales are actively developing, and the work in the sales and logistics departments is being optimized. The quality of distribution is improving, as evidenced by leading positions in the market.
NewsDetail.valuesText: Commitment to quality service, strengthening customer trust, and continuous development. We are proud of our reputation as a leader and reliable partner that contributes to the availability of the best goods for businesses and the population of Tajikistan.
NewsDetail.conclusion: Today, «Capital-T» is a modern, dynamically developing company with great potential and prospects.

VacancyDetail.aboutCompanyText1: We are a developing manufacturer of toilet and household soap, as well as laundry detergent. Our goal is to provide customers with high-quality products that make their lives more comfortable and cleaner. Join our team and contribute to the company's success!
VacancyDetail.aboutCompanyText2: We are looking for an energetic and purposeful leader! Join our team and reach new heights with us if you possess the following qualities:
VacancyDetail.quality1: Leadership skills and ability to motivate a team.
VacancyDetail.quality4: Ability to make quick decisions and solve problems.
VacancyDetail.quality7: Willingness to work in highly competitive conditions.
VacancyDetail.expectation1: Experience as a supervisor or sales department manager for at least 2 years
VacancyDetail.expectation2: Successful experience in team management and achieving high sales results
VacancyDetail.expectation3: Knowledge of the Dushanbe and RRP market and understanding of work specifics...
VacancyDetail.importantText: Working in this position requires high determination and willingness to work in highly competitive conditions. We are looking for people focused on results and ready for challenges.
VacancyDetail.responsibility1: Management and coordination of the sales representatives team.
VacancyDetail.responsibility2: Setting goals and tasks for employees, monitoring their implementation
VacancyDetail.responsibility3: Development and implementation of effective sales strategies
VacancyDetail.responsibility4: Management and coordination of the sales representatives team responsible for a specific territory in Dushanbe and RRP
VacancyDetail.responsibility5: Team management and support, development of their professional skills
VacancyDetail.responsibility6: Negotiations with key clients and partners.
VacancyDetail.responsibility7: Analysis of sales and market trends, preparation of reports for management.
VacancyDetail.responsibility8: Ensuring a high level of customer service.
VacancyDetail.responsibility9: Monitoring the implementation of sales plans and achieving key performance indicators (KPI).
VacancyDetail.offer1: Salary and bonuses above average in RT
VacancyDetail.offer2: Achievable sales plans and established infrastructure
VacancyDetail.offer5: Motivation and reward programs for the best employees.
VacancyDetail.offer6: Compensation for transportation expenses and mobile communications.
VacancyDetail.offer7: Support and mentoring from experienced colleagues.
VacancyDetail.offer8: Modern tools and resources for effective work.
VacancyDetail.interestedText: Fill in all necessary data and upload your resume. We will contact you very soon!
